Dialogue Text: What would you like to do? Play or reminisce?
Let's play a game where you hold your hands out and I'll give you something! I think you'll like it, you've always liked it!
Well, let's play together now! ...Wait. You're supposed to be doing something else, right?
What am I supposed to do?
I don't even know where I am...
The people said you're a ferryman. Quick! The passengers are waiting! We will play when we see each other again! *Fades away*
We're currently at Cordelia! It's said that this place holds special memories. Explore this place and see it for yourself! We'll meet again soon!*Fades away*
We have plenty of time to reminisce slowly! Oh right! There's one thing I wanted to show you!
TADA! Ain't it pretty? Have you seen it before? Do you know what it's called?
These are called sea conches, the people said. They store memories of the past, that must be important to you. Don't forget them now! *Fades away*
So you remember the sea conches after all! Don't forget them now! Bye bye! *Fades away*
